about_the_game:
You have awoken in a strange house.

The fire is all but dead and the wind is howling outside. There are strange artefacts around the house and you soon come to realise that this is no ordinary house. This charmingly creepy little cottage appears to be the home of a witch!

You must escape by finding, using and combining various items, which can be found around the several areas of the house.

Explore, discover secrets, try your hand at magic, unlock spells and get out of the house before the witch Grimazel returns!

Escape from Grimazel's Cottage is a point and click, first person escape/adventure game of magic and witchcraft.

Key Features:

  • ​​Explore a creepy old cottage, using and combining items to aid you

  • A traditional point and click interface designed to keep you within a world of enchantment

  • Learn 8 different magic spells and uncover age-old secrets

  • Explore the darkest corners and the highest shelves to find a way to escape

In this demo, explore the first part of the house and begin your Escape from Grimazel's Cottage!

content_descriptors.notes: Though this game isn't designed to be scary as such, there is an element of danger and the theming is around that of a witch's house, which may not be appropriate for all players.

name: Escape from Grimazel's Cottage Demo
short_description: In a small cottage filled with magical charm, you must use your wits to escape. A traditional point and click interface will make you feel right at home as you learn magical spells and discover secrets along the way. But don't get too comfortable - remember, this is the home of a witch!
